scripts.build: npm run build:treasury && npm run build:streaming && npm run build:distribution && npm run build:governance
scripts.build:treasury: mkdir -p artifacts/treasury && cashc core/treasury/VaultCovenant.cash -o artifacts/treasury/VaultCovenant.json && cashc core/treasury/ProposalCovenant.cash -o artifacts/treasury/ProposalCovenant.json
scripts.build:streaming: mkdir -p artifacts/streaming && cashc core/streaming/VestingCovenant.cash -o artifacts/streaming/VestingCovenant.json && cashc core/streaming/RecurringPaymentCovenant.cash -o artifacts/streaming/RecurringPaymentCovenant.json
scripts.build:distribution: mkdir -p artifacts/distribution && cashc core/distribution/AirdropCovenant.cash -o artifacts/distribution/AirdropCovenant.json && cashc core/distribution/RewardCovenant.cash -o artifacts/distribution/RewardCovenant.json && cashc core/distribution/BountyCovenant.cash -o artifacts/distribution/BountyCovenant.json && cashc core/distribution/GrantCovenant.cash -o artifacts/distribution/GrantCovenant.json
scripts.build:governance: mkdir -p artifacts/governance && cashc core/governance/VoteLockCovenant.cash -o artifacts/governance/VoteLockCovenant.json && cashc core/governance/TallyCommitment_FixedMax.cash -o artifacts/governance/TallyCommitment_FixedMax.json && cashc core/governance/TallyCommitment_Attested.cash -o artifacts/governance/TallyCommitment_Attested.json
scripts.check: npm run check:treasury && npm run check:streaming && npm run check:distribution && npm run check:governance
scripts.check:distribution: cashc --check core/distribution/AirdropCovenant.cash && cashc --check core/distribution/RewardCovenant.cash && cashc --check core/distribution/BountyCovenant.cash && cashc --check core/distribution/GrantCovenant.cash
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:chipnet
scripts.benchmark:all: npm run benchmark:signers && npm run benchmark:votes && npm run benchmark:recipients
